## Quiz #1 - Reading a Stock Quote

```{r quiz1, echo = FALSE}
question("What does EPS stand for?",
  answer("Earnings per Share", correct = TRUE),
  answer("Earnings per Stock", message = "* Incorrect. EPS stands for Earnings per Share."),
  answer("Earnings price Share", message = "* Incorrect. EPS stands for Earnings per Share."),
  answer("Equity per Share", message = "Incorrect. EPS stands for Earnings per Share.")
)

```
